mapper.select: select a.*, b.roles, c.* from TB_USER a left join ROLES b on a.user_id = b.user_id left join TB_COMPANY c on a.user_id = c.user_id order by a.user_id desc
select a.*, b.roles, c.* from TB_USER a left join ROLES b on a.user_id = b.user_id left join TB_COMPANY c on a.user_id = c.user_id where a.user_id = #{id}
select a.*, b.roles, c.* from TB_USER a left join ROLES b on a.user_id = b.user_id left join TB_COMPANY c on a.user_id = c.user_id where a.username = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER (USERNAME, PASSWORD, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_TEL, MANAGER_EMAIL, CAL_MANAGER_NAME, CAL_MANAGER_TEL, CAL_MANAGER_EMAIL, CREATEAT, MODIFYAT, DISABLE_TIME) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{manager_name}, #{manager_tel}, #{manager_email}, #{cal_manager_name}, #{cal_manager_tel}, #{cal_manager_email}, sysdate(), null, null);
